metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation CLIP+ Launcher
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated use of Clip.exe to execute PowerShell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&&')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('clipboard]::')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-f')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/r'))))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated use of Clip.exe to execute PowerShell
